title: Pokémon Sword and Shield
description: Griffin loves his adorable little pocket monsters and tries his very best to convince the boys that they are truly creatures of god. This is generally ineffectual. Also: Pokémon that get far, far worse the more they evolve.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
